meanings.definition: The back part of a shoe that supports the heel.
meanings.sent1: She felt the heelpiece of her shoe pressing against her foot.
meanings.sent2: The heelpiece of the shoe was sturdy and well-crafted.
meanings.sent3: As she walked, the heelpiece of her shoe started singing a little tune.
meanings.sent4: The heelpiece of the shoe was like a loyal friend, always there to support her.
meanings.sent5: The heelpiece of the shoe cradled her heel like a gentle hand.

meanings.definition: A piece of material used to reinforce or repair the heel of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The cobbler carefully attached the heelpiece to the worn-out shoe.
meanings.sent2: She bought a heelpiece to fix the broken heel of her favorite shoe.
meanings.sent3: The heelpiece decided to take a break and went for a walk on its own.
meanings.sent4: The heelpiece was like a superhero swooping in to save the day for the shoe.
meanings.sent5: The heelpiece worked its magic, making the shoe as good as new.
